Military know-how gleaned from Gaza war to help Israeli business, says ministerIsrael's war against Hamas in Gaza will help Israel's economy rebound after the war, partly because its fresh experience of warfare is set to boost military technology sales, its economy minister said on Tuesday. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 18:01:08 GMT ACLYQJNYXRPWXPDOM7HYOKBLUU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/military-know-how-gleaned-gaza-war-help-israeli-business-says-minister-2024-02-27/Emma Farge世界中东
France issues new ban on meat names for plant protein to placate farmersFrance on Tuesday issued a ban on using terms like steak and ham for plant protein products, a second attempt by the government to regulate meat alternatives as it tries to assuage livestock producers who have been at the heart of farmer protests. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 17:37:51 GMT F5UBOSF74BL3NAWKCGBU4GTBXE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/france-issues-new-ban-meat-names-plant- Protein-placate-farmers-2024-02-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine says Russia will step up its hybrid attacks in springRussia will escalate an ongoing influence operation this spring aimed at destabilising Ukraine and scuppering international support for Kyiv in its two-year-old war with Moscow, Ukrainian intelligence warned on Tuesday. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 17:29:00 GMT 6G5PZISN2ZMY7KNKPSEFPCBPMM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says- Russia-will-step-up-its-hybrid-attacks-spring-2024-02-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Brazil's Lula to discuss Esequibo, election with Venezuela's MaduroBrazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva plans a bilateral meeting this week with Venezuelan counterpart Nicolas Maduro to discuss Venezuela's upcoming general election and its border dispute with Guyana. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 17:22:06 GMT M3E57OJ6FNKH7NDJXYXEFZ7QN4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazils-lula-discuss-esequibo-election-with-venezuelas-maduro-2024-02-27/Lisandra Paraguassu世界美洲
Exclusive: Lebanon's Hezbollah will halt fire if Hamas OKs Gaza truce, sources sayLebanon's Hezbollah will halt fire on Israel if its Palestinian ally Hamas agrees to a proposal for a truce with Israel in Gaza - unless Israeli forces keep shelling Lebanon, two sources familiar with Hezbollah's thinking told Reuters on Tuesday. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 16:40:35 GMT WKLTVRTJKVJ3ZHJXILPINU2EEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/lebanons-hezbollah-will-halt-fire-if-hamas-oks-gaza-truce-sources-say-2024-02-27/Laila Bassam, Maya Gebeily世界中东
Navalny's lawyer briefly detained in MoscowA lawyer for Russian opposition politician Alexei Navalny, who accompanied Navalny's mother last week as she fought to get authorities to hand over his body, was briefly detained on Tuesday in Moscow, Russian news media said. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 16:32:24 GMT CRCHGLAWIZKSTH26462TPDY7KM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/navalnys-lawyer-arrested-moscow-reports-2024-02-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Canada, US agree Ukraine needs money from Russian assets, Freeland saysCanada and the United States fully agree on the urgent need to move forward with confiscating frozen Russian sovereign assets to help Ukraine, which has recently faced setbacks on the battlefield, Canada's Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland said on Tuesday.
